title: 7 ways the human body reacts in life or death situations
description: Life or death situations trigger automatic survival responses. The body prioritizes escape and defense, overriding comfort and logic. Adrenaline and stress hormones reorganize brain activity, enhancing threat detection. This leads to altered time perception, suppressed pain, narrowed vision, and temporary strength. Memories become fragmented, and shaking may follow. These involuntary reactions are the body's fight for survival.

Earth’s accidental space shield and the changing face of near Earth radiation
description: Human radio waves have inadvertently altered Earth's radiation belts, creating an unexpected barrier that modifies radiation behavior. This dual influence necessitates a reevaluation of space environment models for future space exploration and technology.

description: With the December Music Season under way, several Sabhas are marking important milestones

title: How T.N. Seshan’s airport arrival led to standoff with Jayalalithaa and attack on a star hotel
description: In the morning on November 27, 1994, the then Chief Election Commissioner of India T.N. Seshan landed at Madras Airport from New Delhi. What should have been a routine arrival quickly turned into a standoff with Tamil Nadu Chief Minister Jayalalithaa.

title: Suspecting affair, quit job: Bengaluru-based techie shoots wife after receiving divorce notice
description: A harrowing event transpired in Bengaluru as a software developer allegedly took his estranged wife's life in broad daylight during rush hour. The victim, who worked as a bank assistant manager, was relocating home with their kids when the altercation erupted. The accused, 40 years old, subsequently surrendered to the police with the weapon.

title: With modernisation push, SCL Mohali may be key stop, but not cutting edge, in chipmaking
description: The Semi-Conductor Lab at Mohali is likely to benefit from a historic infusion of cash, ₹4,500 crore, for modernising. While the facility is unlikely to regain its onetime stature in chipmaking’s frontier, the funds would let it reliably supply government departments, and be an important student resource

description: Vice President C.P. Radhakrishnan said on Tuesday that artificial intelligence should be incorporated into school curricula, and that India should be striving to reach the top of the field

description: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle's Archewell Foundation has rebranded to Archewell Philanthropies, sparking scrutiny over its operational structure and finances. Critics, including Perez Hilton, question the shift to a fiscal sponsor model and highlight a significant imbalance between expenses and grants awarded, raising concerns about transparency and the foundation's charitable impact.

title: UP govt amends UPESSC chief’s eligibility criteria, Opp says it’s to accommodate former DGP
‘Facing death threats, being punished for doing our job’: Bangladesh journos
description: Bangladeshi journalists face grave threats, including arson attacks on media offices and personal surveillance, ahead of the 2026 elections. Despite promises of safety, reporters feel unprotected, with no arrests made following the torching of Prothom Alo and The Daily Star. This escalating crisis signals a dangerous erosion of press freedom.

title: Illicit affair, hired shooter: How woman gave ‘supari’ to kill husband; body dumped near expressway
description: Dausa police have arrested a 35-year-old woman, Shweta alias Shilpi Sharma, for orchestrating the contract killing of her husband. The investigation, triggered by the discovery of an unidentified body, revealed the murder was motivated by an illicit relationship. The main conspirator and hired killer are also in custody.

title: Man kills 8 month pregnant wife in drunken rage
description: A Ludhiana man, Vijay Kumar, has been arrested for allegedly beating his eight-month pregnant wife, Pushpa, to death during a drunken rage. Her brother filed a complaint after Vijay attempted to claim she died of natural causes, despite visible injuries. Police suspect Pushpa fought back before succumbing to the assault.

NTA to roll out live photo, facial recognition checks
description: From 2026, the NTA will implement facial recognition for NEET-UG and JEE-Main to combat impersonation, following a successful pilot with Aadhaar-based authentication.  This, along with mandatory live photo capture during application, aims to bolster exam integrity amid recent leak concerns.  These enhanced security measures were recommended by a government committee.

Epstein files out: Trump referenced in some newly released docs; DOJ calls claims 'untrue'
description: The US Justice Department has unveiled nearly 30,000 additional documents concerning Jeffrey Epstein. These files mention President Trump, including an email detailing his flights on Epstein's private jet in the 1990s. The DOJ clarified that some claims against Trump are unsubstantiated and were submitted before the 2020 election, emphasizing their lack of credibility.

title: Today’s Horoscope, 24 December 2025: Detailed Predictions for Aries, Sagittarius, Virgo, Aquarius, Taurus & More
Tribal pushback over 'illegal settlers' kills 2 in Assam's West Karbi Anglong
description: Two people died and dozens of police officers were injured in violent tribal protests in Assam's West Karbi Anglong district. Demonstrators, armed with bows and crude bombs, clashed with security forces over alleged illegal non-tribal settlements on protected lands. Internet services were suspended as authorities vowed legal action against those involved.

YouTuber under ED lens flew over 130 guests for Dubai for his cruise wedding
description: A UP-based YouTube influencer, Anurag Dwivedi, facing ED money-laundering probes for alleged ties to illegal betting, reportedly spent crores on a lavish Dubai destination wedding for over 130 guests. The lavish affair aboard a cruise ship, including flights and luxury stays, has drawn significant official scrutiny. The ED has seized assets worth an estimated Rs 20 crore.

Pushed, beaten with log: 54-year-old teacher killed by husband in Bengaluru; staged it as accident
description: A 64-year-old electrician has been arrested for allegedly murdering his 54-year-old teacher-wife in Bengaluru. He reportedly pushed her off his motorcycle and beat her with a wooden log, then claimed she fell. Doctors' suspicions about her injuries led to his arrest and confession, citing financial disputes.

description: The tone and tenor of the debate in Parliament show that the last word on this issue has not yet been spoken, and that ensuing discussions in Parliament will have implications for Indian secularism and Hindu-Muslim relations

The incident has sparked outrage online, with many condemning it as an attack on communal harmony.

H-1B visa delay: Microsoft sends 600-word note; warns employees on travel
description: Microsoft has alerted H-1B/H-4 visa employees about significant appointment rescheduling and stamping delays at US consulates, particularly in Chennai and Hyderabad. New dates extend to June 2026, impacting travel plans. The company urges employees to return before current visas expire and has launched a survey to track the evolving situation.

title: Paul Rudd reacts to Travis Kelce’s apology after Chiefs’ playoff exit
description: Actor Paul Rudd shared his perspective on the Kansas City Chiefs' season. He highlighted the joy and memories the team has provided his family. Rudd embraced the team's elimination from playoff contention. He wished Patrick Mahomes a speedy recovery. Rudd also humorously suggested players deserved a break after a long season. He stated he was not too upset.

title: Shane McMahon and Marissa Mazzola’s combined net worth in 2025
description: Shane and Marissa Mazzola-McMahon possess a combined net worth of $650 million, largely attributed to Shane's decades with WWE and his diversified business ventures. While Shane's wealth stems from his executive roles, on-camera presence, and equity in WWE, Marissa's career in film production and PR augments their family fortune.

title: Salesforce reboots AI strategy: Model errors raise concerns
description: Salesforce is scaling back its reliance on large language models due to reliability issues, shifting focus to deterministic automation in its Agentforce product. Executives acknowledge a decline in trust in AI models, with reported instances of models omitting instructions and losing focus. This strategic pivot follows significant support staff reductions attributed to AI agent deployment.

title: Jared Goff’s wife Christen shares how motherhood inspired home makeovers
description: Christen Goff is navigating motherhood by creating two distinct yet personal homes in Los Angeles and Michigan for her and daughter Romy.  She thoughtfully designs each space to reflect its location and their evolving family identity.  Despite the challenges of a newborn and dual residences, Christen finds joy and belonging in this new chapter.

title: Who is Brittani? Inside Aaron Rodgers’ wife as marriage mystery deepens
description: Steelers quarterback Aaron Rodgers has found unexpected peace in his marriage to Brittani.  Unlike his previous public relationships, Brittani values privacy.  Rodgers credits his wife with providing unconditional love and stability.  This new chapter sees a calmer, more focused Rodgers as he navigates his final NFL years.  His teammates and coaches notice the positive change.
